alert.note: Alert for Buckingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:35PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Buckingham County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1134 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wingina, or 10 miles northwest of Buckingham, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buckingham... Dillwyn... New Canton... Toga... Centenary... Sheppards... and Andersonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
